R

remove(AbstractChar) - Method in class items.consumables.AbstractTimedConsumable
This method removes the bonus of the item from a particular Character, unmodifying stats and removing things from duration lists in the process.
remove(AbstractChar) - Method in class items.consumables.DefensePotion
The DefensePotion's .remove() method sets the defense of the target character to their defense minus the mod stat of the DefensePotion.
run(Entity[]) - Static method in class opcode.EncounterHandler
This method converts an inputted Entity Array into an ArrayList, then uses the .run() method on it.
run(ArrayList<Entity>) - Static method in class opcode.EncounterHandler
This method runs an ArrayList of Entitys by making use of various other private methods and a while loop.
